pageContent: Objectives: To evaluate the efficacy of high intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) for the treatment of localized prostate cancer in a population of potentially curable patients.

metaData.source:
Treatment of patients after failed high intensity focused ultrasound and radiotherapy for localized prostate cancer: salvage laparoscopic extraperitoneal radical prostatectomy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/18831671/
